1. National e-Governance Plan (NeGP) 2.0: 12. e-Kranti is an important pillar of the
13. The Vision of e-Kranti is
14. The Mission of e-Kranti is to ensure a Government wide transformation by delivering
(a) e-kranti: (a) important Government services electronically to citizens through integrated and interoperable systems via multiple modes, while ensuring efficiency, transparency and reliability of such services at free of cost.
(b) Digital India: (b) important Government services electronically to citizens through integrated and interoperable systems via multiple modes, while ensuring efficiency, transparency and reliability of such services at affordable costs.
(c) e-Sarkar: (c) all Government services electronically to citizens through integrated and interoperable systems via multiple modes, while ensuring efficiency, transparency and reliability of such services at free of cost.
(d) Digital Governance: (d) all Government services electronically to citizens through integrated and interoperable systems via multiple modes, while ensuring efficiency, transparency and reliability of such services at affordable costs
